funding-source.institution: Natural Sciences and Engineering Research Council of Canada (CA)

institution-wrap.institution: Natural Sciences and Engineering Research Council of Canada

funding-group.funding-statement: This work was supported by Natural Sciences and Engineering Research Council of Canada, grants 386590-2010 and 2016-5488 (to BMB). Computational resources provided by SHARCnet. The funders had no role in study design, data collection and analysis, decision to publish, or preparation of the manuscript.
